title: Shorthand Notations
content:
## Content Sizing Shorthands





#### Modify Top / Right / Bottom/ Left
```css
padding: 20px 20px 20x 20px
```

#### Modify Top Bottom / Right Left
```css
padding: 20px 20px
```


#### Modify Top / Right Left / Bottom
```css
padding: 20px 20px 20px
```
